root.name: All-Pro Basketball
root.description: OverviewAll-Pro Basketball is a basketball game developed by Aicom and published by Vic Tokai for the NES. All-Pro Basketball is known as Zenbei!! Pro Basketball in Japan.TeamsThe teams in All-Pro Basketball are fictional teams as All-Pro Basketball does not have the NBA license.New York SlicksNew York SlicksGrecoRigginsJamesKingReubenLavineBorofskyNicholsBranchMonroeFrizzelElicChicago ZephyrsChicago ZephyrsSterlingWicksLambertMcCoyBrennerAardvarkSmuckerMickellHatfieldPiccoloSparksHusseyBoston Red CoatsBoston Red CoatsGraffTalbotZappaRooneyHyderGarnerRivasWinnMcCloudMurphyDoodyMcLaughlinLos Angeles BreakersLos Angeles BreakersGroteMaloneMorris FrazierCruzAnthonyDelaneyWolfGoldbergDickersonCowenMolebashDallas StallionsDallas StallionsKurtzHersheyEwingBarclayNashYamadaHorowitzTowersAaronDiamondWapnerOverlandPhoenix WingsPhoenix WingsMarloweKaplanTillmanElbertGilmoreRiveraJollyBrandoCareySquireWinfreyDonahueSeattle SonicsSeattle SonicsBrendleTildenHoganNewarkShearsonKushiPhillipsGabrielMaitlandRedshawPiggotSuluSan Francisco BayridersSan Francisco BayridersSellickCochranManningPickleTrumpVizardFrostBergerMcMahonRuppFeinsteinTwitty
